Ken Jennings hosts.

clues.clue: In 1857 this city beat out Le√≥n & Granada to become Nicaragua's capital

final_jeopardy.clue: Backed by 14,000 troops, he invaded England to restore, in his words, its "religion, laws, and liberties"
